author: henning
msg: Remove the hard-coded "A4" format of the Velocity PDF
documentation. Allow the size to be changed by an ant define.
Change the default to "Letter" as suggested from the mailing list, so
that both US and europeans can print out the docs.
Add some documentation on how to do this.

author: tmnk
msg: - DERBY-1513_1535 Trial 1 for DERBY-550 & Trial 2 for DERBY-550 - Patch by Tomohito Nakayama (tomonaka@basil.ocn.ne.jp)

msg: A number of updates and modifications to fill out the framework outline
